title: How many students attend universities in Europe? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi there, I have been doing a few research on this sector and cam with a few useful information that can help you with this question. In Europe, they tend to classify and divide charts as such by number of tertiary students in education. Unfortunately I only managed to acquire the information noted in 2015. However, there has been a number of decline in the university students numbers which is becoming quite alarming. Nevertheless, assuming that the numbers from 2015 are the overall average of the same, with a few extras different: The total students doing their Bachelor's or equivalent in Europe comes up to 11984.4 Which is quit a high number. Similarly with the UK, those in transit of acquiring their first degree in combined and various subjects areas comes up to a total of 395,580 in the years of 2014/15 - 399,820 in 2015/16 and 414,30 in 2016/2017.
